function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation system causing the spread of airborne diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of infection via infectious aerosols","Mitigation":"Installation of efficient ventilation systems","Technologies":"Efficient ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Misidentification of true airborne infectious diseases","Impact":"Inappropriate infection control measures for specific diseases","Mitigation":"Enhanced training on disease transmission and infection control measures","Technologies":"Disease-specific testing and identification methods","People":"Healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of infectious agents to UVGI exposure","Impact":"Ineffective control of infectious agents in the environment","Mitigation":"Implementation of UVGI systems in air and on surfaces","Technologies":"UVGI systems","People":"Environmental health and safety personnel, infection control teams","Owner":"Facility management, infection control teams"}]}
